actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to make appointments to the Committee on Environment and Public Works, the Committee on Foreign Relations and the Committee on Small Business.

summary.text: Appoints Senator Wofford to the following Senate committees: (1) Environment and Public Works; (2) Foreign Relations; and (3) Small Business.

titles.title: A resolution to make appointments to the Committee on Environment and Public Works, the Committee on Foreign Relations and the Committee on Small Business.
